document.full_text: toyota motor corp  will start cutting production at its north american plants next week to adjust for supply disruptions stemming from the march 11 earthquake in japan, the company said on friday.
document.title: toyota to cut north american output next week
lines_and_colors: toyota motor corp  will start cutting production at its north american plants next week to adjust for supply disruptions stemming from the march 11 earthquake in japan, the company said on friday.
